languages.text: "За что тебя обрекли на такую страшную участь?"
"Why were you consigned to such a terrible fate?"
languages.original_text: "За что тебя обрекли на такую страшную участь?"

traits.locale_text: "Why were you consigned to such a terrible fate?"
"Why were you consigned to such a terrible fate?"
"Why were you consigned to such a terrible fate?"
"Why were you consigned to such a terrible fate?"
"Why were you consigned to such a terrible fate?"
"Why were you consigned to such a terrible fate?"

languages.text: «¿Por qué te condenaron a un destino tan terrible?».
languages.original_text: "Why were you consigned to such a terrible fate?"

traits.locale_text: «¿Por qué te condenaron a un destino tan terrible?».

languages.text: “你怎么会落得如此可怕的下场？”
languages.original_text: "Why were you consigned to such a terrible fate?"

traits.locale_text: “你怎么会落得如此可怕的下场？”

languages.text: 「なぜ、君はそのような恐ろしい運命を背負うことになったんだ？」
languages.original_text: "Why were you consigned to such a terrible fate?"

traits.locale_text: 「なぜ、君はそのような恐ろしい運命を背負うことになったんだ？」

languages.text: "Warum wurdet Ihr zu einem so schrecklichen Schicksal verdammt?"
languages.original_text: "Why were you consigned to such a terrible fate?"

traits.locale_text: "Warum wurdet Ihr zu einem so schrecklichen Schicksal verdammt?"

languages.text: « Pourquoi vous a-t-on condamné à un sort aussi funeste ? »
languages.original_text: "Why were you consigned to such a terrible fate?"

traits.locale_text: « Pourquoi vous a-t-on condamné à un sort aussi funeste ? »

languages.text: "Neden böyle korkunç bir kadere mahkûm edildin?"
languages.original_text: "Why were you consigned to such a terrible fate?"

traits.locale_text: "Neden böyle korkunç bir kadere mahkûm edildin?"
